description: Whether you're stuck working from your kitchen table, your couch or even — gasp! — your bed, your posture is probably suffering by now. It's time you made your remote office setup more official with this deal on a standing desk, available for just under $85 with promo code CNNDESK.
title: Standing desk sale: Score a standing desk for about $85
title_page:
Standing desk sale: Score a standing desk for about $85
 - CNN
maintext:
Whether you're stuck working from your kitchen table, your couch or even — gasp! — your bed, your posture is probably suffering by now. It's time you made your remote office setup more official with this deal on a standing desk, available for just under $85 with promo code CNNDESK.
Standing Desk, 32 inches ($84.99 with code CNNDESK, originally $399.99; dailysteals.com)
Standing Desk, Daily Steals
This height-adjustable model can be placed on top of your current desk (or table, or countertop), allowing you to work sitting down or standing up at will. There are unlimited adjustable points between 6 feet and 13 feet from the desk surface, so you can choose your optimal position, and a gas spring lift offers smooth, easy adjustment with just the squeeze of a handle.
This desk also comes with a removable keyboard tray to better accommodate your setup, and a large storage tray provides the perfect spot to place your cell phone, pens, pencils and other desk accessories.
So start stretching your legs and saving some money with this standing desk deal now. For more great deals, check out CNN Coupons.
Note: The prices above reflect the retailer's listed price at the time of publication.
